characterList.errorDescription: Something went wrong while loading characters

loginForm.title: Login to your account
loginForm.description: Enter your email below to login to your account
loginForm.helper: We keep your data encrypted and only use it to sign you in.

benefits.security: Enterprise-grade security keeps your credentials safe.
benefits.sync: Stay in sync across devices with instant refresh.
benefits.support: Personalized insights help you pick up where you left off.

legal.disclaimer: By continuing, you agree to our

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

registerForm.title: Create an account
registerForm.description: Enter your information below to create your account
registerForm.name: Name
registerForm.emailDescription: We'll use this to contact you. We will not share your email with anyone else.
registerForm.helper: Password must include at least one uppercase letter, number, and symbol.
registerForm.passwordHelper: Use a unique phrase that you can easily remember but others can't guess.

benefits.profile: Craft a rich profile that highlights what matters to you.
benefits.security: Multi-layer security keeps your information protected.
benefits.community: Join a vibrant community and get personalized recommendations.

legal.disclaimer: By continuing, you agree to our

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.confirmPasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email and we'll send a link to create a new password.

form.title: Request a password reset
form.helper: Make sure you have access to this inbox. The link expires in 24 hours.

steps.title: What happens next
steps.item1: We'll email you a secure link to reset your password.
steps.item2: Open the link and choose a new, strong password.
steps.item3: Log in with your new credentials and get back to your account.

tips.title: Security tips
tips.item1: Never share the reset link, even with people you trust.
tips.item2: Use a unique password you don't use anywhere else.
tips.item3: Update your password manager so you won't lose access.

reset.title: Create your new password
reset.description: Pick a strong password that keeps your account secure.
reset.warning: If you close this page before submitting, the reset link might expire.

errors.generic: An error occurred while updating the password. Please try again.

form.title: Update password
form.description: Use a password you haven't used on this site before.

token.valid: Reset link detected. Finish the form below to complete the update.
token.missing: We couldn't detect a reset token. Request a fresh email and try again.

items.case: Includes both upper and lower case letters
items.special: Adds a special character such as !, @, or ?

items.manager: Update any password managers after saving the new password.
items.devices: Sign out on shared devices once the password has been changed.
items.support: Contact support immediately if you didn't request this reset.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

accountBasicInfo.title: Personal Information
accountBasicInfo.description: Manage your personal details and profile information. This information will be visible to other users on the platform.
accountBasicInfo.name: Name

toast.errorUpdatingUser: An error occurred while updating the user

accountEmailChange.title: Change Email
accountEmailChange.description: Update your email to keep your account secure
accountEmailChange.currentEmailDescription: This is the email address associated with your account. You can change it to a new email address.
accountEmailChange.newEmailDescription: This is the new email address you want to use for your account. You will need to confirm the new email address to update your account.

validation.emailMustBeDifferent: New email must be different from your current email address.
validation.emailValidAndReady: Email address format is valid and ready to update.

toast.error: An error occurred while changing the email address. Please try again.

importantInformation.title: Important Information
importantInformation.description: Changing your email address is an important security action. Please review the following information before proceeding.

emailVerification.title: Email Verification
emailVerification.description: You will receive a verification email at your new address. You must confirm the change before it takes effect.

accountSecurity.title: Account Security
accountSecurity.description: Your account will remain secure during the email change process. All existing sessions will remain active.

accessToAccount.title: Access to Your Account
accessToAccount.description: Once verified, you'll use your new email address to log in and recover your account if needed.

errors.generic: An error occurred while changing the email address. Please try again.

steps.step3: Check your new email inbox for a verification link
steps.step4: Click the verification link to confirm the change

securityReminder.title: Security Reminder
securityReminder.description: Make sure you have access to the new email address before making this change. You won't be able to complete the verification process without access to your new inbox.

accountSessions.activeSessionsDescription: Manage and monitor devices that have access to your account
accountSessions.title: Active Sessions
accountSessions.description: Manage and monitor devices that have access to your account
accountSessions.revokeOtherSessionsTitle: Are you absolutely sure you want to revoke other sessions?
accountSessions.revokeOtherSessionsDescription: This will revoke other sessions and remove them from your account. You will need to login again to access your account.
accountSessions.revokeAllSessionsTitle: Are you absolutely sure you want to revoke all sessions?
accountSessions.revokeAllSessionsDescription: This will revoke all sessions and remove them from your account. You will need to login again to access your account.
accountSessions.securityTipDescription: If you notice any suspicious activity, immediately revoke the session and change your account password. Enable two-factor authentication for additional security.
accountSessions.revokeSessionTitle: Are you absolutely sure you want to revoke this session?
accountSessions.revokeSessionDescription: This will revoke the session and remove it from your account. You will need to login again to access your account.

accountChangePassword.title: Change Password
accountChangePassword.description: Update your password to keep your account secure
accountChangePassword.passwordRecommendationsDescription: Your password should meet the following recommendations for enhanced security:

securityBestPracticesItems.neverShare: Never share your password with anyone
securityBestPracticesItems.uniquePassword: Use a unique password for each account

toast.errorChangingPassword: An error occurred while changing the password

stayUpdated.title: Stay Updated
stayUpdated.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates.
